content: **crocheted small shawl in drops merino extra fine or drops cotton merino the piece is worked top down with lace pattern ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern me-269 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **size** height down middle = approx 28 cm width along top = approx 82 cm **yarn** drops merino extra fine from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g colour 31 forest green or use drops cotton merino from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g colour 11 forest green **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 4 5 mm **crochet gauge** 16 treble crochets in width and 8 row in height = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
